

Creazione di una rete con 5 nodi normali e 1 nodo bootstrap:

test:prepare_network(1, 5).


--- FIND BUCKET INDEX TEST ---

Int1 = 1301231212312317812381681827361872381268273681233.
1110001111101101001110011011111111110111100001111100010111111001110101000000111000111000101111111110100111101001000010100101110100000000000011000101001101010001

Int2 = 898234982823849208999328420182343794823904092049.
1001110101010110001111111110101000001101000011001001000011011101010100100110010101110001000010000000110010111001011011111111111000000010000000111101111110010001

Bin1 = <<Int1:160>>.
Bin2 = <<Int2:160>>.
utils:find_bucket_index(Bin1, Bin2).
% Index = 1

{ID1, ID2} = utils:make_similar_ids(10).
utils:find_bucket_index(ID1, ID2).
% Index = 11

OK

--- NETWORK CONFIGURATION VALIDATION TESTS ---
